news.title: Mark McCabe to bring brand new show to Dublin's 3Olympia Theatre
news.summary: The Irish dance music icon will play on April 2, 2026.

news.title: Shane MacGowan tribute album to be released
news.summary: The album is set to come out next year.

news.title: David Keenan announces Irish tour
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Wednesday, December 3 at 10am.

news.title: Gilbert O'Sullivan to play 3Arena – his only show in Ireland in 2026
news.summary: He will perform on Saturday, October 10 2026.

news.title: RÜFÜS DU SOL announce Dublin show
news.summary: Tickets go on sale Friday and can be found at the link below.

news.title: Renaming of Herzog Park to be withdrawn
news.summary: Taoiseach Micheál Martin has called for the proposal to be "withdrawn in its entirety and not proceeded with".

news.title: TradFest in South Dublin: Gigs, sessions, family-friendly céilí-dancing and immersive shows in some of the the area's most beautiful settings
news.summary: Get ready for unique performances from Liam Ó Maonlaí, Brian Kennedy, Louise Mulcahy, Eoghan Ó Ceannabháin, Mundy and more – as TradFest comes to some of South Dublin’s most special spaces…
